product_name: Mountain House Just In Case Breakfast Bucket
long_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Breakfast Bucket contains 16 pouches of 4 different just-add-hot-water breakfasts. It's easy to store and easy to view the bucket's contents. Convenient for camping, backpacking and home emergency preparedness. Each pouch requires 1 cup of hot water; 30 servings total from 16 pouches. 4 pouches of scrambled eggs with ham and peppers (2 servings per pouch). 4 pouches of scrambled eggs with bacon (1.5 serving per pouch). 4 pouches of granola with milk and blueberries (2 servings per pouch). 4 pouches of breakfast skillet: hash browns, eggs, pork sausage, peppers and onions (2 servings per pouch). The Mountain House Just In Case Breakfast Bucket measures 12 x 10 x 13 in.
short_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Breakfast Bucket contains 16 pouches of 4 different just-add-hot-water breakfasts. It's easy to store and easy to view the bucket's contents.
